bio:
Vigilant Adalvald, a Nord man, is a Vigilant of Stendarr. He is an acquaintance of Vigilant Tolan.
He is found in Dimhollow Crypt, and is being interrogated by a vampire named Lokil (an Orc man). He keeps a journal, titled Notes on Dimhollow Crypt.
Quotes:
When talking to Lokil: "I'll never tell you anything, vampire. My oath to Stendarr is stronger than any suffering you can inflict on me.”
name: Vigilant Adalvald
